Panetta)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f3d6d7642f43f001ddfdda6?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn57@2020_4/2020/09/05/09-01-20-284_d092c113efba9289.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn60@2020_3/2020/09/05/09-01-18-751_00f09200df8426be.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?i=EP2QLJvvwSA:Oq8bsvo5EPg:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn38@2020_3/2020/09/05/09-01-13-631_61bfbfede6ca400a.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?i=EP2QLJvvwSA:Oq8bsvo5EPg:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn71@2020_3/2020/09/05/09-01-22-750_27d7f9266e7a458c.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?i=EP2QLJvvwSA:Oq8bsvo5EPg:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn87@2020_4/2020/09/05/09-01-14-187_3b7c5895e25115f9.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?d=cGdyc7Q-1BI":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn54@2020_1/2020/09/05/09-01-18-350_767e235117808cfa.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?d=QXVau8BzmBE":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn12@2020_4/2020/09/05/09-01-17-769_edf0fa9b5dde1c97.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/clusterstock/~4/EP2QLJvvwSA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn19@2020_1/2020/09/05/09-01-14-955_72e26125d0806c03.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1599296467319},{"createdTime":"2020-09-05 17:01:07","updatedTime":"2020-09-05 17:01:07","title":"Meet the horse-racing tycoons competing at the 2020 Kentucky Derby","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/kentucky-derby-owners-2014-4","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f5261f7e6ff30001d4e7211?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Kentucky Derby\" height=\"1619\" width=\"2158\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The 146th Kentucky Derby is Saturday, September 5.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Robin Marchant/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>The Kentucky Derby is Saturday, September 5.&#160;</li>\n<li>Racing horses can cost anywhere from <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/rich-people-buy-yearling-racehorses-investment-keeneland-2018-10\">$500,000 to $2.4 million</a> to buy.</li>\n<li>From former MGM exec Gary Barber to oilman John C. Oxley, these are the tycoons with horses racing in this year's Kentucky Derby.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>From the pink polo shirts to the <a href=\"http://www.businessinsider.com/mint-julep-recipe-2014-5\">mint juleps</a> and floppy hats, the Kentucky Derby has always been a sporting event for the upper crust.</p><p>And no wonder. Racing horses can cost as much as $2.4 million. They can also yield big returns: the&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/belmont-stakes-horses-2018-6\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\" data-uri=\"2f8f9e2ee29da092cc82f580d4bac041\">2018 Triple Crown</a> winner Justify sold for $500,000 as a yearling and is <a href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-sports-justify-breeding/report-justify-worth-record-75-million-after-triple-crown-idUSKBN1J60H0\">now worth $75 million</a>.</p><p>\"There's so much excitement in owning Thoroughbred horses — it's the closest thing [people] can be involved with in owning a sports franchise as there is,\" Bob Elliston, vice president of racing and sales at&#160;<a href=\"https://www.keeneland.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"20\" data-uri=\"091316e909ae15c354226d1dac82d378\">Keeneland Racing</a> in the world's horse capital of Lexington, Kentucky, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/rich-people-buy-yearling-racehorses-investment-keeneland-2018-10\">previously told Business Insider</a>.</p><p>Who can afford these steep prices?</p><p>Business Insider looked at the horse owners using racing database <a href=\"https://www.equibase.com/stats/\">Equibase</a>. Here are the horse tycoons vying to win the gold cup Churchill Downs in the 146th Kentucky Derby on Saturday, September 5. The five winners will share the <a href=\"https://uk.sports.yahoo.com/news/kentucky-derby-payout-breakdown-much-042704449.html?guccounter=1&guce_referrer=aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZ29vZ2xlLmNvbS8&guce_referrer_sig=AQAAAE03uG7zfb32Nu8-XTkuppLhfA-rcdZDuw7z9RCDRxi0QykIG2oD-qyQRPkL0tv7KIdtRPBy4pCYXkvSjmAi5xtfNo0CxRgBF3DkJvkqjbP-qVlcAe1DQrmmlqJnk9yMIaPCNC5EjH5Ui8X5t-KYh-DpKhJiCfX-VLVBGQQvwpp0GQQvwpp0\">$3 million</a> in prize winnings, with the first place winner taking home $1.86 million.</p><p>All odds were determined using <a href=\"https://www.vegasinsider.com/horse-racing/odds/kentucky-derby/\">Vegas Insider</a>.</p><p><em>Alyson Penn contributed to an earlier version of this article.</em></p>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tHedge fund executive George E. Hall\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5aed052e7708e9379f7351f2?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Kentucky Derby 2017\" height=\"807\" width=\"1076\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Max Player not pictured.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Patrick Smith/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Horse:</strong> Max Player</p><p><strong>Odds:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.vegasinsider.com/horse-racing/odds/kentucky-derby/\">30/1</a></p><p><a href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/profile/person/2174993\">Hall</a> is the majority owner of Max Player, which he shares with SportBLX Thoroughbreds Corp. Hall is the CEO and president of Clinton Group, a hedge fund specializing in mortgage-backed securities.&#160;</p><p>Hall's racing interest dates back to an early age, when he used to visit the track <a href=\"https://www.keeneland.com/sites/default/files/Halls.pdf\">with his grandfather</a>. He's had <a href=\"https://www.app.com/story/sports/horses/2020/06/18/belmont-stakes-2020-rumsons-george-hall-owner-max-payer-excited-chances/3202406001/\">three horses</a> in the Kentucky Derby so far. In 2018, he listed his Manhattan mansion for <a href=\"https://www.mansionglobal.com/articles/hedge-fund-executive-relists-manhattan-mansion-for-37-5-million-85115\">$37.5 million</a>.</p><p>&#160;</p><p>&#160;</p>\n\tOilman John C. Oxley\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f525d277ed0ee001e25d87a?format=jpeg\" alt=\"john oxley\" height=\"817\" width=\"1089\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">ROBERT SULLIVAN/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Horse:</strong> Enforceable</p><p><strong>Odds:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.vegasinsider.com/horse-racing/odds/kentucky-derby/\">30/1</a></p><p><a href=\"https://www.kentuckyderby.com/owners/john-c-oxley\">Oxley</a> founded oil and gas exploration firm Oxley Petroleum in 1962. He sold it in 2003 and began a smaller venture named Oxley Resources, LLC, another oil and gas company. He's an active polo player, having been inducted into the Polo Hall of Fame.</p><p>So far, he's earned <a href=\"https://www.americasbestracing.net/owners/john-c-oxley\">$43.3 million</a> from his lifetime of horse racing wins.</p>\n\tBusinessman Robert V. Lapenta\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f51a513e6ff30001d4e7062?format=jpeg\" alt=\"robert lapenta\" height=\"1810\" width=\"2414\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>LaPenta is second from left.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Julio Cortez/AP Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Horse:</strong> Money Moves</p><p><strong>Odds:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.vegasinsider.com/horse-racing/odds/kentucky-derby/\">30/1</a></p><p><a href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/profile/person/1461091\">LaPenta</a> has a hefty resume. He's chairman, CEO, and president of Revolution Lighting Technologies, which designs and manufactures LED lighting solutions. He also founded Aston, a private investment company, and co-founded L-3 Communications and L-1 Identity Solutions. He sold the latter for <a href=\"https://www.keeneland.com/racing/robert-v-lapenta\">$1.6 billion in 2011</a>.</p><p>He owns Money Moves with Bortolazzo Stable.</p><p>&#160;</p>\n\tFormer entertainment exec Gary Barber\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f51a9877ed0ee001e25d6ec?format=jpeg\" alt=\"gary barber.JPG\" height=\"1761\" width=\"2348\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Mario Anzuoni/Reuters</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Horse:</strong> South Bend</p><p><strong>Odds:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.vegasinsider.com/horse-racing/odds/kentucky-derby/\">50/1</a></p><p><a href=\"https://www.americasbestracing.net/owners/gary-barber\">Barber</a> owns shares in South Bend along with Wachtel Stable and Peter &#38; Pantofel Stable.&#160;</p><p>The entertainment exec was the chairman-CEO of MGM <a href=\"https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/news/gary-barber-as-ceo-mgm-1095794\">until 2018</a>, leading the studio in a comeback after bankruptcy that included a push into television and two hit James Bond films. He is the co-founder of Spyglass Entertainment, which produced \"Seabiscuit,\" and is now the CEO of Spyglass Media.</p>\n\tCoal and energy entrepreneur Chester Thomas\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f527931e6ff30001d4e72f3?format=jpeg\" alt=\"mkentycky derby.JPG\" height=\"1577\" width=\"2103\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Mr. Big News not pictured.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Mike Segar/Reuters</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Horse:</strong> Mr. Big News</p><p><strong>Odds:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.vegasinsider.com/horse-racing/odds/kentucky-derby/\">50/1</a></p><p>Mr. Big News is owned by Allied Racing Stable, which is owned by <a href=\"https://www.americasbestracing.net/owners/allied-racing-stable-llc\">Thomas</a>, an entrepreneur in the coal and energy industry. He owns mining company Green River Colleries.</p><p>Thomas' lifelong interest in racing began when he attended races with his father as a boy. To date, Allied Racing Stable has earned more than <a href=\"https://www.americasbestracing.net/owners/allied-racing-stable-llc\">$6 million</a>.</p>\n\tHorse racing entrepreneurs Dean and Patti Reeves\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f5258fbe6ff30001d4e71d4?format=jpeg\" alt=\"dean and patti reeves\" height=\"1874\" width=\"2499\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Michele Sandberg/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Horse:</strong> Sole Volante</p><p><strong>Odds:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.vegasinsider.com/horse-racing/odds/kentucky-derby/\">30/1</a></p><p>The Reeves founded <a href=\"https://www.reevestr.com/about#:~:text=Dean%20is%20a%20native%20of,in%20the%20State%20of%20Georgia.\">Reeves Thoroughbred Racing</a> in 2009. Dean is chairman and co-owner of Reeves Young, a commercial contracting company in Georgia and is president of the Georgia Horse Racing Coalition. Patti owns ReevesShaw Media, an outdoor advertising consulting business.&#160;</p><p>Reeves Thoroughbred Racing owns Sole Volante in conjunction with Andie Biancone, daughter of horse trainer Patrick Biancone.</p>\n\tRefrigerator heir Jim Bakke\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f527958e6ff30001d4e72f5?format=jpeg\" alt=\"FILE - In this May 4, 2019, file photo, Luis Saez rides Maximum Security, right, across the finish line first against Flavien Prat on Country House during the 145th running of the Kentucky Derby horse race at Churchill Downs in Louisville, Ky. Churchill Downs says the rescheduled Kentucky Derby and Oaks will run this fall with spectators under strict guidelines to limit crowd density for the race that annually attracts more than 100,000. The 146th runnings of the Oaks for fillies and the Derby were postponed from May 1-2 to Sept. 4-5 because of the coronavirus pandemic. Fans will be encouraged to wear masks at all times unless seated and to practice social distancing. (AP Photo/Matt Slocum, File)\" height=\"3620\" width=\"4827\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Attachment Rate not pictured.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Associated Press</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Horse:</strong>&#160; Attachment Rate</p><p><strong>Odds:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.vegasinsider.com/horse-racing/odds/kentucky-derby/\">50/1</a></p><p>Bakke owns Attachment Rate in partnership with Gerald Isbister. He is the president and CEO of his family refrigeration company, <a href=\"https://www.subzero-wolf.com/company/press-releases/sub-zero-freezer-company-biography-james-j-bakke-president-and-ceo\">Sub-Zero</a>. He also serves as the board of directors of the Association of Home Appliance Manufacturers (AHAM).</p>\n\tHorse racing businessman Terry Finley\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f523595e6ff30001d4e70e9?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Terry Finley\" height=\"1823\" width=\"2432\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Julie Jacobson/Reuters</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Horse:</strong> Winning Impression</p><p><strong>Odds:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.vegasinsider.com/horse-racing/odds/kentucky-derby/\">50/1</a></p><p>Finley is the owner and founder of West Point Thoroughbreds, the <a href=\"https://www.ownerview.com/panelist/terry-finley\">largest Thoroughbred horse racing</a> partnership management company in the world. Finley began the company with one investor and one horse; today it has <a href=\"https://www.tca.org/terry-finley/\">500 investors and 65 horses</a>. West Point Thoroughbreds owns Winning Impression along with Pearl Racing.</p><p>Prior to turning <a href=\"http://www.cnbc.com/id/44205150\">his passion into his career</a>, he served eight years as an artillery officer in the Army attaining the rank of captain before his honorable discharge in 1994. &#160;</p><p>He and his wife have made millions in the 20+ years they've owned their stable, <a href=\"http://www.cnbc.com/id/44205150\">according to CNBC</a>.</p><p>Finley was <a href=\"https://www.paulickreport.com/news/people/terry-finley-becomes-chairman-ramon-dominguez-president-of-new-york-race-track-chaplaincy/\">recently named chairman</a> of the New York Race Track Chaplaincy.</p>\n\tSteel tubing magnate Lee Searing\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f527a697ed0ee001e25d98c?format=jpeg\" alt=\"May 6, 2017; Louisville , KY, USA; John Velazquez aboard Always Dreaming (5) leads the field and wins the 2017 Kentucky Derby at Churchill Downs. Mandatory Credit: Jamie Rhodes-USA TODAY Sports\" height=\"507\" width=\"675\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Honor A.P. not pictured.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Thomson Reuters</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Horse:</strong> Honor A.P.</p><p><strong>Odds:</strong> <a href=\"http://www.vegasinsider.com/horse-racing/odds/kentucky-derby/\">5/1</a></p><p>California residents Lee and Susan Searing own <a href=\"http://www.kentuckyderby.com/horses/candy-boy\">CRK Stable</a>, which gets its name from the first initials of their three children.&#160;</p><p>Lee operates Searing Industries, a West Coast company specializing in the manufacture of welded steel tubing used in things like dining furniture, medical equipment, and scaffolding.</p><p>Lee and his father owned several horses in partnership from 1968 until his father's death in 2002. &#160;</p>\n\tRacing manager Jack Knowlton\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f52505f7ed0ee001e25d821?format=jpeg\" alt=\"jack knowlton.JPG\" height=\"1535\" width=\"2047\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Reuters</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Horse:</strong> Tiz the Law</p><p><strong>Odds:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.vegasinsider.com/horse-racing/odds/kentucky-derby/\">3/5</a></p><p>Knowlton is the operating manager of Sackatoga Stable. He's served as the racing manager for <a href=\"https://www.sackatoga.com/about\">more than 50 racehorses</a>, including the 2003 Kentucky Derby winner. He aims to find New York-bred horses that can compete at the highest level, <a href=\"https://www.timesunion.com/sports/article/A-talk-with-Tiz-the-Law-owner-Jack-Knowlton-15305941.php\">according to Times Union</a>.</p><p>&#160;</p>\n\tPublic Storage founder B. Wayne Hughes\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f525f6ce6ff30001d4e71ff?format=jpeg\" alt=\"b wayne hughes.JPG\" height=\"1830\" width=\"2441\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">John Sommers II/Reuters</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Horse:</strong> Authentic and Thousand Words</p><p><strong>Odds:</strong> <a href=\"http://www.vegasinsider.com/horse-racing/odds/kentucky-derby/\">8/1</a>, <a href=\"https://www.vegasinsider.com/horse-racing/odds/kentucky-derby/\">15/1</a></p><p>Spendthrift Farm was purchased in 2004 by billionaire <a href=\"http://www.kentuckyderby.com/horses/medal-count\">B. Wayne Hughes</a>, the owner of Public Storage and founder of the Parker Hughes Cancer Research Center.&#160;Hughes, now retired, is worth $2.9 billion, <a href=\"http://www.forbes.com/profile/b-wayne-hughes/\">according to Forbes</a>.&#160;</p><p>Spendthrift Farm shares Authentic with several other owners: MyRaceHorse Stable, Madaket Stables LLC, and Starlight Racing. It also shares Thousand Words with Albaugh Family Stables.</p>\n\tFormer hedge fund manager Jack Wolf\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/536404a36bb3f7477556ff29?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Wolfs\" height=\"361\" width=\"480\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\"><a href=\"http://starlightracing.com/staff.aspx\" target=\"_blank\">Starlight Racing</a></p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Horse:</strong> Authentic</p><p><strong>Odds:</strong> <a href=\"http://www.vegasinsider.com/horse-racing/odds/kentucky-derby/\">8/1</a></p><p>Wolf and his wife Laurie founded Starlight Racing in 2000. They have been in business for over 10 years and in 2004 were joined in the current partnership by Barbara and Donald Lucarelli.</p><p>A native of Louisville, Kentucky, Jack was a hedge fund manager at Columbus Partners in Atlanta before retiring to concentrate on racing.&#160;Laurie serves as co-managing partner of StarLadies Racing, Starlight's new all-female partnership, and also serves on the board of the&#160;<a href=\"http://www.backsidelearningcenter.org/\">Backside Learning Center</a>&#160;at Churchill Downs.</p><p>&#160;</p>\n\tBusinessman Sol Kumin\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f52482d7ed0ee001e25d7c0?format=jpeg\" alt=\"sol kumin .JPG\" height=\"1666\" width=\"2223\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">LUCAS JACKSON/Reuters</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Horse:</strong> Authentic</p><p><strong>Odds:</strong> <a href=\"http://www.vegasinsider.com/horse-racing/odds/kentucky-derby/\">8/1</a></p><p><a href=\"https://www.forbes.com/sites/davidprosser/2020/06/25/how-sol-kumin-turned-a-labour-of-love-into-the-worlds-leading-horse-racing-business/#6103d46522ac\">Kumin</a> spent 20 years working on Wall Street and founded hedge fund Folger Hill Asset Management in 2014 with more than $1 billion raised from investors. He's the primary owner of Madakat Stables, which co-owns Authentic and is one of the world's <a href=\"https://www.forbes.com/sites/davidprosser/2020/06/25/how-sol-kumin-turned-a-labour-of-love-into-the-worlds-leading-horse-racing-business/#6103d46522ac\">most successful racing stables</a>.</p>\n\tHere are the remaining horses:\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f52519a7ed0ee001e25d831?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Kentucky Derby\" height=\"1333\" width=\"1778\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\"><a href=\"http://www.gettyimages.com/detail/news-photo/california-chrome-ridden-by-victor-espinoza-leads-the-field-news-photo/488055105\" target=\"_blank\">Getty Images / Andy Lyons</a></p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Storm the Court</strong> (owned by Exline-Border Racing, David Bersen LLC, Susanna Wilson, and Dan Hudock)</p><p><strong>Odds</strong>: <a href=\"http://www.vegasinsider.com/horse-racing/odds/kentucky-derby/\">50/1</a></p><p><strong>Major Fed</strong> (owned by Lloyd Madison Farms)</p><p><strong>Odds</strong>: <a href=\"http://www.vegasinsider.com/horse-racing/odds/kentucky-derby/\">50/1</a></p><p><strong>Necker Island</strong> (Raymond Daniels, Wayne Scherr, and Will Halbut Racing)</p><p><strong>Odds</strong>: <a href=\"http://www.vegasinsider.com/horse-racing/odds/kentucky-derby/\">50/1</a></p><p><strong>NY Traffic</strong> (John Fanelli, Cash is King, LC Racing, Paul Braverman, Team Hanley)</p><p><strong>Odds</strong>: <a href=\"http://www.vegasinsider.com/horse-racing/odds/kentucky-derby/\">20/1</a></p><p><strong>King Guillermo</strong> (owned by Victor Martinez)</p><p><a href=\"https://www.vegasinsider.com/horse-racing/odds/kentucky-derby/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\" Hernandez)</p><p><a href=\"http://www.vegasinsider.com/horse-racing/odds/kentucky-derby/\">Scratched</a></p>\n</div><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a Hoffower)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f5261f7e6ff30001d4e7211?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn21@2020_6/2020/09/05/09-01-07-494_84c246e0a6943df4.webp","https://i.insider.com/5aed052e7708e9379f7351f2?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn64@2020_4/2020/09/05/09-01-22-737_e8f726d2e816863f.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f525d277ed0ee001e25d87a?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn21@2020_4/2020/09/05/09-01-21-482_852e0d52a97a3623.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f51a513e6ff30001d4e7062?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn70@2020_3/2020/09/05/09-01-15-243_47c50ead939da744.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f51a9877ed0ee001e25d6ec?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn49@2020_6/2020/09/05/09-01-18-287_b1f2bc9f01149c94.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f527931e6ff30001d4e72f3?format=jpeg":null,"https://i.insider.com/5f5258fbe6ff30001d4e71d4?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn28@2020_6/2020/09/05/09-01-16-440_6a0d98b629e5263e.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f527958e6ff30001d4e72f5?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn1@2020_4/2020/09/05/09-01-17-078_8391d357ae51b1ac.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f523595e6ff30001d4e70e9?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn41@2020_4/2020/09/05/09-01-13-751_33ac0dc7bd0aa40a.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f527a697ed0ee001e25d98c?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn95@2020_3/2020/09/05/09-01-17-632_18906d67d5ba3209.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f52505f7ed0ee001e25d821?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn73@2020_3/2020/09/05/09-01-14-015_a11bb919442cfbcb.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f525f6ce6ff30001d4e71ff?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn54@2020_5/2020/09/05/09-01-17-368_79dd3f7050ffbe7a.webp","https://i.insider.com/536404a36bb3f7477556ff29?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn78@2020_3/2020/09/05/09-01-13-895_910cc820e8e83b1d.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f52482d7ed0ee001e25d7c0?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn55@2020_2/2020/09/05/09-01-24-173_e73fb04b8d151f80.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f52519a7ed0ee001e25d831?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn36@2020_6/2020/09/05/09-01-15-028_25673e0c38bdee85.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn60@2020_3/2020/09/05/09-01-18-751_00f09200df8426be.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?i=IbWDMutRFlg:QKKcIRaXsfs:F7zBnMyn0Lo":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?i=IbWDMutRFlg:QKKcIRaXsfs:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn75@2020_4/2020/09/05/09-01-16-835_943b5c138c3ec489.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?i=IbWDMutRFlg:QKKcIRaXsfs:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn16@2020_3/2020/09/05/09-01-20-814_edad694f052b4243.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?d=cGdyc7Q-1BI":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn54@2020_1/2020/09/05/09-01-18-350_767e235117808cfa.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?d=QXVau8BzmBE":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn12@2020_4/2020/09/05/09-01-17-769_edf0fa9b5dde1c97.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/clusterstock/~4/IbWDMutRFlg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn70@2020_5/2020/09/05/09-01-14-303_9e2aa8370a58779e.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1599296467319},{"createdTime":"2020-09-05 17:01:07","updatedTime":"2020-09-05 17:01:07","title":"How to block someone on the Tinder app by unmatching from them","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-block-someone-on-tinder","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f32fe372438173d7519f63f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Tinder app on mobile device with profiles as background\" height=\"2670\" width=\"3560\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Tinder doesn&#39;t have a blocking feature, but unmatching offers the same protections.\n<p class=\"copyright\">SOPA Images/Contributor/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>You can't \"block\" someone on Tinder, but unmatching from them works the same way.</li><li>When you unmatch with someone on Tinder, you won't be able to see each other when you swipe, and your conversations will disappear.</li><li>If you want to unmatch someone, unlike blocking on other platforms, there is no way to undo it.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\">Visit Business Insider's Tech Reference library for more stories</a>.</strong></li></ul><p>Tinder revolutionized the way people date online. Instead of browsing profiles for hours and searching out potential dates, you can merely \"swipe right\" on the people you like, and \"swipe left\" on those you don't.&#160;</p><p>Swiping right makes it easier than ever to meet and connect with people, but there are still some drawbacks to it.&#160;</p><p>While most people you meet on Tinder are probably just like you — respectful and trying to find a genuine match — you can run into some people you'd rather not connect with. On Tinder, if you somehow come into contact with someone you no longer want to be connected to, you can't block them. But you can unmatch with them.&#160;</p><p>If you're unmatching with this person because they were harassing or stalking you, or doing something else that might mean they pose a danger to other people, you should also report them to Tinder to take action.</p><p>When you unmatch someone on Tinder, you are automatically removed from each others' matches list. Your conversations are also deleted, and they won't be able to interact with you on the app ever again. There is currently no way to undo this action, so make sure unmatching is what you want.&#160;</p><p>If so, here's how to do it.&#160;</p><h2>How to block someone on Tinder by unmatching</h2><p><strong>1.</strong> Open the Tinder app.&#160;</p><p><strong>2.</strong> Go to your conversations by tapping the speech bubble in the top right corner.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f5134927ed0ee001e25d529?format=jpeg\" alt=\"How_to_block_someone_on_Tinder_ _1\" height=\"1334\" width=\"750\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>This will take you to your private messages with matches.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Melanie Weir/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>3.</strong> Tap on the conversation with the person you want to unmatch with.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f5134bc7ed0ee001e25d52a?format=jpeg\" alt=\"How_to_block_someone_on_Tinder_ _2\" height=\"1334\" width=\"750\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Make sure this is the person you want to unmatch with.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Melanie Weir/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>4.</strong> In the top right corner of the screen, tap the shield icon.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f5134f37ed0ee001e25d52c?format=jpeg\" alt=\"How_to_block_someone_on_Tinder_ _3\" height=\"1334\" width=\"750\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The shield icon indicates the app&#39;s safety tools.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Melanie Weir/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>5.</strong> In the pop-up menu labeled \"Safety Toolkit,\" tap \"Unmatch\" disconnect your profiles and block the Tinder user from seeing your profile or contacting you.&#160;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f513518e6ff30001d4e6eba?format=jpeg\" alt=\"How_to_block_someone_on_Tinder_ _4\" height=\"1334\" width=\"750\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Tap unmatch to disconnect your profiles.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Melanie Weir/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>6.</strong> Tap \"yes, unmatch\" in the second pop-up to confirm your action.&#160;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f513541e6ff30001d4e6ebb?format=jpeg\" alt=\"How_to_block_someone_on_Tinder_ _5\" height=\"1334\" width=\"750\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Confirm to finish unmatching.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Melanie Weir/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><div id=\"ProductCard_5d8e19fb2e22af18f40d281d\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5d8e19fb2e22af18f40d281d&type=small&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><div id=\"ProductCard_5ce596f89252e30bf479d993\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5ce596f89252e30bf479d993&type=small&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><h2>Related coverage from <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-reference\">Tech border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/clusterstock/~4/ANeeBu7EvtY\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 04 Sep 2020 22:02:00 +0000","feedId":13983,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5f32fe372438173d7519f63f?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"069f3840b9d721777201ba514c1f48b5","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn33@2020_5/2020/09/05/09-01-07-538_248e0bf7f72c697a.webp","destWidth":3560,"destHeight":2670,"sourceBytes":80812,"destBytes":80812,"author":"insider@insider.com (Melanie Weir)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f32fe372438173d7519f63f?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn33@2020_5/2020/09/05/09-01-07-538_248e0bf7f72c697a.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f5134927ed0ee001e25d529?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn95@2020_2/2020/09/05/09-01-21-368_8181068093ca29d9.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f5134bc7ed0ee001e25d52a?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn63@2020_3/2020/09/05/09-01-18-722_945818bf749d01ed.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f5134f37ed0ee001e25d52c?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn69@2020_6/2020/09/05/09-01-19-667_ad23ae8e297af145.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f513518e6ff30001d4e6eba?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn3@2020_3/2020/09/05/09-01-17-735_62136df0b9256cd7.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f513541e6ff30001d4e6ebb?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn6@2020_5/2020/09/05/09-01-15-354_ecc4a7b995fd16e2.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn60@2020_3/2020/09/05/09-01-18-751_00f09200df8426be.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?i=ANeeBu7EvtY:H6ywVnCWcpc:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn55@2020_3/2020/09/05/09-01-15-079_fcc2a7f64bb776b2.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?i=ANeeBu7EvtY:H6ywVnCWcpc:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn45@2020_6/2020/09/05/09-01-18-469_feadbf7277e60cb2.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?i=ANeeBu7EvtY:H6ywVnCWcpc:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn46@2020_3/2020/09/05/09-01-23-470_e2cc9ebb677ad1f3.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?d=cGdyc7Q-1BI":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn54@2020_1/2020/09/05/09-01-18-350_767e235117808cfa.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?d=QXVau8BzmBE":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn12@2020_4/2020/09/05/09-01-17-769_edf0fa9b5dde1c97.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/clusterstock/~4/ANeeBu7EvtY":null},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1599296467318},{"createdTime":"2020-09-05 17:01:07","updatedTime":"2020-09-05 17:01:07","title":"AOC is on the ballot: 44% of Americans report seeing a political ad mentioning Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, alternately a socialist villain and a progressive champion","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/half-of-americans-have-seen-a-political-ad-mentioning-alexandria-ocasio-cortez-2020-8","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f511402e6ff30001d4e6dfe?format=jpeg\" alt=\"aoc dnc 2020 MILWAUKEE, WISCONSIN - AUGUST 18: U.S. Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (D-NY) addresses the second night of the virtual 2020 Democratic National Convention as she seconds the nomination of U.S. Senator Bernie Sanders via avideo feed as seen at te convention&#39;s hosting site on August 18, 2020 in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. Once expected to draw 50,000 people to Milwaukee, the convention is now taking place virtually due to the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic. (Photo by Brian Snyder-Pool/Getty Images)\" height=\"1500\" width=\"3000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>US Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (D-NY) addresses the second night of the virtual 2020 Democratic National Convention via video feed as seen at the convention&#39;s hosting site on August 18, 2020 in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Brian Snyder-Pool/Pool/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Forty-four percent of Americans and registered voters say they've seen a political ad featuring Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, according to recent Insider polling.&#160;</li>\n<li>The freshman congresswoman is being mentioned in political ads to motivate voters by politicians across the spectrum, including by the president.&#160;</li>\n<li>Notably, the ads motivated liberals and conservatives at relatively similar levels.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>&#160;</p><p>Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez of New York won her Democratic primary in June with nearly 75% of the vote in her safe blue district.</p><p>But Ocasio-Cortez's political appeal is being tested far beyond the Bronx and Queens.</p><p>Politicians across the country and the political spectrum are juxtaposing or aligning themselves with Ocasio-Cortez and her progressive politics in their campaign ads. About 44% of Americans and registered voters have seen an ad featuring or mentioning the freshman congresswoman, according to recent Insider polling conducted over SurveyMonkey Audience.&#160;&#160;</p><p>About 15% of registered voters said they saw an ad featuring AOC and were \"more inclined to vote for Republicans\" after seeing it, while about 14% saw one and were \"more inclined to vote for Democrats.\" Sixteen percent saw one and said it wouldn't affect their vote. A third of respondents said they hadn't seen any such ads, 8% said they don't watch political ads, and 14% said they hadn't seen one, and even if they had it wouldn't affect their vote.&#160;</p><p>Notably, the ads motivated Democrats and Republicans at relatively similar levels. About 45% of \"very conservative\" voters, 39% of \"moderately conservative\" voters, and 21% of \"slightly conservative\" voters said they were inclined to vote for the GOP after seeing the ads. On the flip side, 37% of \"very liberal\" voters, 25% of \"moderately liberal\" voters, and 16% of \"slightly liberal\" voters said they were more inclined to vote for Democrats.&#160;</p><h2><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f52ac2b7ed0ee001e25dac6?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A Trump campaign ad links Democratic nominee Joe Biden to Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez and Sen. Bernie Sanders.\" height=\"640\" width=\"1280\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>A Trump campaign ad links Democratic nominee Joe Biden to Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez and Sen. Bernie Sanders.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Screenshot/Donald J. Trump for President</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></h2><h2>A champion and a bogeywoman</h2><p>President Donald Trump and his reelection campaign have long attempted to tie Ocasio-Cortez's political brand and policy proposals to Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden.&#160;</p><p>And in some of the most conservative states and districts across the country, Republicans are using Ocasio-Cortez as a bogeywoman and symbol of the so-called \"radical\" socialist left. Ocasio-Cortez's name, image, and policies have been used in several competitive GOP primary races, in which candidates positioned themselves as the most pro-Trump and anti-left option.&#160;</p><p>\"AOC wants to plunge us into Communism — she is clueless about how capitalism even works,\" Republican Marjorie Taylor Greene, a QAnon supporter who last month won the GOP primary runoff in a deep-red Georgia district, <a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2oP99HiZ_iA\">said in a campaign ad</a>.&#160;</p><p>Greene has featured Ocasio-Cortez and other progressive freshman congresswomen, including Reps. Ilhan Omar, Rashida Tlaib, and Ayanna Pressley, in several social media posts. On Friday, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/facebook-deleted-gop-candidates-post-threatening-violence-against-aoc-2020-9\">Facebook removed an image Greene posted</a> of herself holding an assault rifle next to images of Ocasio-Cortez, Omar, and Tlaib. The social media giant said the image violated its policy on \"violence and incitement.\"&#160;</p><p>Lauren Boebert, a far-right Republican nominated for Congress in Colorado's third district, ran explicitly as <a href=\"https://www.rollcall.com/2020/07/01/lauren-boebert-ran-against-aoc-and-the-squad-and-beat-rep-scott-tipton-in-the-process/\">an anti-AOC candidate</a>, tying GOP incumbent Rep. Scott Tipton to \"left-wing lunatics.\"</p><p>\"Scott Tipton cosponsored HR 6467, teaming up with AOC and her squad to give Boulder a bailout,\" <a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T0yYeOWmU30&feature=emb_titleitle\">one of her ads</a> said.&#160;</p><p>Both Greene and Boebert will likely win the general elections in their conservative districts and become Ocasio-Cortez's colleagues next year.</p><p>Running in a similarly competitive Senate primary in Tennessee, Republican Bill Hagerty flashed an image of Ocasio-Cortez's face in <a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=2&v=TipXgmpNMYg&feature=emb_titlemb_title\">a campaign ad</a> as the narrator says, \"The Washington liberals have wanted to impeach President Trump since day one of his presidency. They know they can't beat Trump at the ballot box, so they're trying to steal the next election.\"&#160;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f511a147ed0ee001e25d494?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez is featured in an ad for Sen. Ed Markey&#39;s reelection campaign.\" height=\"640\" width=\"1280\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez is featured in an ad for Sen. Ed Markey&#39;s reelection campaign.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Screenshot/Ed Markey for Senate</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>Ocasio-Cortez has somewhat eclipsed House Speaker Nancy Pelosi as the right's bogeywoman. While Pelosi was mentioned in more than 130,000 House and Senate campaign ads during the 2018 cycle, she's been mentioned in just 44 ads during the 2020 cycle, <a href=\"https://www.politico.com/newsletters/playbook/2020/09/04/why-republicans-arent-really-campaigning-against-pelosi-490256\">Politico reported Friday</a>. The GOP may have dropped their attacks on Pelosi in part because Democrats took back the House — flipped 41 seats — in 2018.</p><p>For her part, the 30-year-old democratic socialist has leveraged her massive social media following and influence on the left to endorse and campaign for fellow progressives.</p><p>Sen. Ed Markey leaned heavily on Ocasio-Cortez's support to win his competitive Massachusetts primary against Rep. Joe Kennedy on September 1. Markey ran as the more progressive Democrat in the race, touting his work with Ocasio-Cortez on the Green New Deal and positioning himself as a fighter for a younger, grassroots left.&#160;</p><p>Ocasio-Cortez cut <a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xk0M-qk--LY\">a 30-second ad</a> for Markey, while the senator featured her prominently in another ad that went viral.&#160;</p><p>But Democrats looking to win independent or right-leaning voters have stayed away from Ocasio-Cortez — and in at least one recent case, touted their opposition to her policies.&#160;</p><p>Democratic Rep. Xochitl Torres Small, who represents a rural purple New Mexico district, noted in <a href=\"https://twitter.com/JacobRubashkin/status/1301603952287416320\">a recent campaign ad</a> that she voted against \"AOC's fracking ban bill.\"&#160;</p><p>INSIDER conducted a SurveyMonkey Audience poll on a national sample August 7-8. We had 1,150 respondents and a margin of error of plus or minus 3 percentage points.</p><p><em>SurveyMonkey Audience polls from a national sample balanced by census data of age and gender. Respondents are incentivized to complete surveys through charitable contributions. Generally speaking, digital polling tends to skew toward people with access to the internet. SurveyMonkey Audience doesn't try to weight its sample based on race or income. This survey had a total 1,150 respondents, a margin of error plus or minus 3 percentage points with a 95% confidence level.</em></p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/clusterstock/~4/-S7Uw6yJC0M\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 04 Sep 2020 20:55:00 +0000","feedId":13983,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5ef2ba87988ee35e0b65d733?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"2bf76db65ed811c5059ac1e7f092035f","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn13@2020_4/2020/09/05/09-01-12-751_5e80b2a49e8fc327.webp","destWidth":746,"destHeight":560,"sourceBytes":58920,"destBytes":58920,"author":"jwong@businessinsider.com (Jada Wong,Owen Burke)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5ef2c991f34d05587940f8b5?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn23@2020_3/2020/09/05/09-01-15-015_dd17ef5ec6fd9336.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn60@2020_3/2020/09/05/09-01-18-751_00f09200df8426be.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?i=-S7Uw6yJC0M:I5L4ufaoUf0:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn15@2020_2/2020/09/05/09-01-54-517_06d93ef5fa5ecd49.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?i=-S7Uw6yJC0M:I5L4ufaoUf0:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn65@2020_3/2020/09/05/09-01-17-427_26cf8c6f95b6b5a1.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?i=-S7Uw6yJC0M:I5L4ufaoUf0:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn73@2020_6/2020/09/05/09-01-15-335_cb91819833e9006e.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?d=cGdyc7Q-1BI":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn54@2020_1/2020/09/05/09-01-18-350_767e235117808cfa.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?d=QXVau8BzmBE":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn12@2020_4/2020/09/05/09-01-17-769_edf0fa9b5dde1c97.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/clusterstock/~4/-S7Uw6yJC0M":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn90@2020_5/2020/09/05/09-01-18-907_05cdf081ee69b5fa.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1599296467308},{"createdTime":"2020-09-05 17:01:07","updatedTime":"2020-09-05 17:01:07","title":"First-term Rep. Ben McAdams and Burgess Owens face off in Utah's 4th Congressional District","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/utah-4th-district-house-election-ben-mcadams-burgess-owens-2020","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f40155d89aff80028ab73fb?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Mia Love Ben McAdams\" height=\"1000\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>U.S. Rep. Mia Love and Salt Lake County Mayor Ben McAdams shake hands as they take part in a debate at the Gail Miller Conference Center at Salt Lake Community College on Monday, Oct. 15, 2018, in Sandy, Utah, as the two battle for Utah&#39;s 4th Congressional District.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Scott G Winterton/Deseret News, via AP, Pool</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>First-term Rep. Ben McAdams will face Burgess Owens in Utah's 4th Congressional District.</li>\n<li>The district is one of thirty which voted for President Donald Trump in 2016 but is currently represented by a Democrat.</li>\n<li>McAdams defeated incumbent Rep. Mia Rose in 2018 by only 697 votes &#8211; just 0.257 percent.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>&#160;</p><p>First-term <strong>Rep. Ben McAdams</strong> will face Republican and former NFL football player <strong>Burgess Owens</strong> in Utah's 4th Congressional District.</p><h2>The candidates</h2><p>McAdams is the only Democratic member in Congress from Utah. He was formerly the mayor of Salt Lake County, a position he held for six years. McAdams is member of the <a href=\"https://bluedogcaucus-costa.house.gov/members\">Blue Dog Coalition</a> of fiscally conservative Democrats and sits on the Financial Services Committee and the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.&#160;</p><p>In 2018, McAdams defeated Republican incumbent Rep. Mia Love by just <a href=\"https://ballotpedia.org/Utah%27s_4th_Congressional_District\">697 votes</a> – a margin of 0.257 percentage points.</p><p>Owens is a former <a href=\"https://www.burgess4utah.com/resumebio\">safety in the National Football League</a> for the New York Jets and Oakland Raiders. Following his football career, Owens ran an electronics company with his brother which ultimately ended in Owens <a href=\"https://www.sltrib.com/news/politics/2020/07/06/meet-burgess-owens-utah/\">filing for bankruptcy</a>.</p><p>He later moved to Utah in 2012 and founded <a href=\"http://secondchance4youth.org/#about\">Second Chance 4 Youth</a>, a non-profit which supports incarcerated children. He frequently appears as a guest commentator on Fox News and spoke at the Republican National Convention.</p><p>On his campaign website, Owens cites some of the hardships he's faced in his life as motivating his fundamental belief in the power of hard work and the unique promise that America offers.&#160;</p><p>\"Seven years after my NFL retirement and business failure I experienced a long summer during which I worked a series of jobs necessary to support my family and start my journey out of poverty,\" <a href=\"https://www.burgess4utah.com/burgess-bio\">he wrote.</a> \"That included a day job as a chimney sweep followed by a midnight shift as a security guard. It was at the end of this long summer that I would begin a successful 25-year career in the corporate arena. \"</p><p>The liberal media watchdog organization Media Matters for America reported in late August <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/gop-convention-speaker-and-candidate-burgess-owens-plagiarized-book-report-2020-8\">that Owens had plagiarized significant portions of his book</a> \"Why I Stand\" from Wikipedia, History.com, and several news publications.&#160;</p><h2>The district</h2><p>Utah's 4th Congressional District is located in the center of the state. It is home to much of Salt Lake County and parts of Utah, Juab, Sanpete counties, and a portion of Salt Lake City. The district was first included on the ballot in 2012 following new data from the release of the 2010 U.S. Census.</p><p>The central Utah district is <a href=\"http://centerforpolitics.org/crystalball/2020-house/\">one of just thirty</a> in the United States which voted for President Donald Trump in 2016 but is currently represented by a Democrat. Trump carried the district by 6.7 percentage points 39.1% to 32.4% in 2016, <a href=\"https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1whYBonfwlgTGnYl7U_IH31G0JNYQ9QBIjDfqkZHkW-0/edit#gid=0\">according to the Daily Kos.&#160;</a></p><h2>The money race</h2><p>According to the <a href=\"https://www.opensecrets.org/races/summary?cycle=2020&id=UT04UT04\">Center for Responsive Politics</a>, McAdams has raised $3.4 million– over four times more than Burgess with $769,000. With $2.6 million in cash on hand, McAdams has amassed vastly more than Burgess who has only $92,686 in remaining cash on hand.</p><h2>What some of the experts say</h2><p>The race between Owens and McAdams is rated as a \"toss-up\" by <a href=\"https://cookpolitical.com/ratings/house-race-ratings\">The Cook Political Report</a>, \"tilts Democratic\" by <a href=\"https://insideelections.com/ratings/house\">Inside Elections</a>, and \"leans Democratic\" according to <a href=\"http://centerforpolitics.org/crystalball/2020-house/\">Sabato's Crystal Ball at the University of Virginia Center for Politics</a>.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/utah-4th-district-house-election-ben-mcadams-burgess-owens-2020'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a Compass</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>A controversial New York City townhouse has sold for a fraction of its original $50 million asking price after six years on and off the market.</li>\n<li>Located just north of the United Nations, the seven-story residence is the former home of CBS founder William Paley and a jetsetting Iranian princess.</li>\n<li>The home has been at the center of a legal battle since the princess' death in 2016.</li>\n<li>Take a look inside 29 Beekman Place, which boasts 11 bathrooms, an elevator, and sweeping views of the East River.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>&#160;</p>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tAfter six years on and off the market, the storied townhouse at 29 Beekman Place has finally sold to a New York real estate company for $11.5 million, the New York Times reported.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee8e3b319182421f73c1c46?format=jpeg\" alt=\"29 Beekman Place\" height=\"1253\" width=\"1671\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy Compass</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Broker Donna Olshan first revealed that the home was in contract in her <a href=\"https://olshan.com/\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" Post in June.</p><p>Charlie Attias of Compass and Greg Corbin of Rosewood Realty brokered the deal.</p><p><em>Source: <a River, was originally listed for $50 million in 2014.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee929f6988ee3532b498683?format=jpeg\" alt=\"29 Beekman Place Skitch\" height=\"947\" of nine townhouses on the block.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee90aa02618b936e007a19f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Chairman of CBS William Paley\" height=\"1781\" width=\"2375\" Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><em>Source:&#160;<a href=\"https://www.compass.com/listing/29-beekman-place-manhattan-ny-10022/340358066994288609/\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"40\">Compass</a></em></p>\n\tJetsetting Princess Ashraf Pahlavi, the twin sister of Iran's last shah, purchased the home in 1975, just four years before her family fled Iran during the 1979 Islamic Revolution, and counted it as a residence until her death in 2016.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee90ba73f737024fe5a32a5?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Princess Ashraf Pahlavi\" height=\"1650\" width=\"2199\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Princess Ashraf Pahlavi during an interview at her apartment in New York on April 22, 1980.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Bettmann/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>According to Compass real estate records, Pahlavi listed the home for $49.9 million in February 2014. By June 2015, the asking price had dropped to $34 million.</p><p><em>Source: <a href=\"https://www.compass.com/listing/29-beekman-place-manhattan-ny-10022/340358066994288609/\">Compass</a>, <a href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/middle_east/ashraf-pahlavi-twin-sister-of-irans-late-shah-dies-at-96/2016/01/08/e5df0e32-b5b7-11e5-9388-466021d971de_story.html\">Washington Post</a>, <a href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2014/09/09/nyregion/for-iconoclasts-of-decades-past-design-took-wing-on-secluded-beekman.html\">New York Times</a></em></p>\n\tSince Pahlavi's death, the property has been the center of a legal battle between two of her former employees. It went to bankruptcy court last year and received an offer for $10.3 million; however, the offer fell through.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee8e252988ee32680234b6f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"29 Beekman Place\" height=\"1666\" width=\"2221\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy Compass</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><em>Source: <a href=\"https://www.compass.com/listing/29-beekman-place-manhattan-ny-10022/340358066994288609/\">Compass</a>, <a href=\"http://litvaklawgroup.com/litvak-law-group-in-the-news-uri-litvak-represents-heir-and-beneficiary-of-iranian-princess-ashraf-in-battle-over-manhattan-residence/\">Litvak Law Group</a>, <a href=\"https://therealdeal.com/2020/06/03/inside-the-battle-over-an-iranian-princess-midtown-mansion/\">The Real Deal</a></em></p>\n\tDespite being enveloped in controversy, the home still appears fit for a princess. Chandeliers line the ceilings ...\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee8e3e82618b91f540c5f67?format=jpeg\" alt=\"29 Beekman Place\" height=\"1667\" width=\"2223\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy Compass</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><em>Source: <a href=\"https://www.compass.com/listing/29-beekman-place-manhattan-ny-10022/340358066994288609/\">Compass</a></em></p>\n\t... and one bathroom looks straight out of a provincial palace.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee8e33f3ad861057c4527d4?format=jpeg\" alt=\"29 Beekman Place\" height=\"1667\" width=\"2222\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy Compass</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><em>Source: <a href=\"https://www.compass.com/listing/29-beekman-place-manhattan-ny-10022/340358066994288609/\">Compass</a></em></p>\n\tThere is a large, formal dining room ...\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee8e3973f73700ca47b4da8?format=jpeg\" alt=\"29 Beekman Place\" height=\"1667\" width=\"2222\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy Compass</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><em>Source: <a href=\"https://www.compass.com/listing/29-beekman-place-manhattan-ny-10022/340358066994288609/\">Compass</a></em></p>\n\t... plus multiple, wood-paneled living areas.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee8e2baaee6a87145774367?format=jpeg\" alt=\"29 Beekman Place\" height=\"1666\" width=\"2221\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy Compass</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><em>Source: <a href=\"https://www.compass.com/listing/29-beekman-place-manhattan-ny-10022/340358066994288609/\">Compass</a></em></p>\n\tThe home also has eight wood-burning fireplaces.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee8e2a33f73700bf559a646?format=jpeg\" alt=\"29 Beekman Place\" height=\"1667\" width=\"2223\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy Compass</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><em>Source: <a href=\"https://www.compass.com/listing/29-beekman-place-manhattan-ny-10022/340358066994288609/\">Compass</a></em></p>\n\tMany details, like the moldings and fireplaces, date back to the 1930s.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee8e387f0f41907773768c2?format=jpeg\" alt=\"29 Beekman Place\" height=\"1667\" width=\"2223\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy Compass</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><em>Source: <a Compass</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><em>Source: <a href=\"https://www.compass.com/listing/29-beekman-place-manhattan-ny-10022/340358066994288609/\">Compass</a></em></p>\n\t... and 11 bathrooms, each more regal than the next.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee8e2303ad861048929e816?format=jpeg\" alt=\"29 Beekman Place\" height=\"1667\" width=\"2223\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courtesy Compass</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><em>Source: <a href=\"https://www.compass.com/listing/29-beekman-place-manhattan-ny-10022/340358066994288609/\">Compass</a></em></p>\n\tIn addition to a sprawling chef's kitchen, there is a butler's pantry and wine cellar.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee8e23c988ee32680234b6c?format=jpeg\" alt=\"29 Beekman Place\" height=\"1667\" width=\"2223\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p skyline ...\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee8e27b3f73700bef6e9572?format=jpeg\" alt=\"29 Beekman Place\" height=\"1667\" width=\"2222\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p in.\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ee8e3605af6cc6a1f1e0d05?format=jpeg\" alt=\"29 Beekman Place\" height=\"1660\" width=\"2213\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p 17:01:07","updatedTime":"2020-09-05 17:01:07","title":"How to delete apps on your Android device in 2 different ways","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-delete-apps-on-android","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f52aa85e6ff30001d4e740f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Android phone white background\" height=\"1979\" width=\"2969\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Androids offer two ways to remove apps from your home screen.\n<p class=\"copyright\">T3 Magazine/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>There are two ways you can delete apps on your Android device: permanently or by temporarily relocating them.&#160;</li>\n<li>You can delete apps entirely from your Android through the phone's settings app or remove them from your home screen by dropping them into the app drawer.</li>\n<li>When you move an app to the app drawer, its data is not deleted, and you can access it.</li>\n<li>If you delete the app entirely, its data will also be deleted, and you'll need to reinstall it to use it again.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-reference\">Visit Business Insider's Tech Reference library for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>If you're like most people, you probably have too many apps on your phone.&#160;</p><p>From productivity apps you downloaded but never used to games you played for two weeks before abandoning, it's easy to overload your phone with unnecessary apps.</p><p>If you're an Android user looking to clean up your home screen and pare it down to only what you need and use, there's good news. Android makes it very easy to clean up your home screen, and you don't even need to delete the apps to do so permanently.</p><p>Android offers you the ability to trash an app altogether. But if you have apps that you don't want to see every time you open your phone, but also don't want to delete permanently, Android lets you move them to the app drawer instead.&#160;</p><p>Moving an app to the app drawer means they won't be visible on your home screen, but you can still access them without having to redownload them.</p><p>Here's how to permanently or temporarily remove an app on your Android.&#160;&#160;</p><h2>How to move apps to the app drawer on an Android&#160;</h2><p><strong>1.</strong> Press and hold the app you want to remove.&#160;</p><p><strong>2.</strong> Your phone will vibrate once, granting you access to move the app around the screen.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f52ab24e6ff30001d4e741f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"How to delete apps on Android   1.JPG\" height=\"1333\" width=\"750\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Press and hold on the app you want to get rid of until it vibrates.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Melanie Weir/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>3.</strong> Drag the app to the top left corner of the screen, where it says 'Remove.'&#160;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f52ab43e6ff30001d4e7420?format=jpeg\" alt=\"How to delete apps on Android 2\" height=\"1333\" width=\"750\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>To move the app to the app drawer, drag it over to the Remove icon.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Melanie Weir/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>4.</strong> Take your finger off the app once the app turns gray to complete the action.&#160;</p><h2>How to permanently delete apps on an Android&#160;</h2><p><strong>1.</strong> Press and hold the app you want to remove.&#160;</p><p><strong>2.</strong> Your phone will vibrate once, granting you access to move the app around the screen.</p><p><strong>3.</strong> Drag the app to the top of the screen where it says \"Uninstall.\"&#160;</p><p><strong>4.</strong> Once it turns red, remove your finger from the app to delete it.&#160;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f52ab65e6ff30001d4e7421?format=jpeg\" alt=\"How to delete apps on Android 3\" height=\"1333\" width=\"750\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>To delete the app entirely, drag it over to the Uninstall icon.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Melanie Weir/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><div id=\"ProductCard_5e6a7c1f84159f1b1c0bcad4\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5e6a7c1f84159f1b1c0bcad4&type=small&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><h2>Related coverage from <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-reference\">Tech Reference</a>:</h2><ul><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-add-bitmoji-to-android-keyboard\">How to add Bitmoji to your Android keyboard and use the personalized emoji library in texts and other apps</a></h3></li><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-activate-voice-control-on-android\">How to activate voice controls on your Android device, and make Google searches or open apps with your voice</a></h3></li><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-add-widgets-android\">How to add widgets on an Android device and resize them on your home screen</a></h3></li></ul><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-delete-apps-on-android'>Business Insider</a></div><div src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/clusterstock/~4/KWxZi5rVRSY\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 04 Sep 2020 21:47:00 +0000","feedId":13983,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5f52ac537ed0ee001e25dac7?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"34dce69f9e13c9c6e4d5f338803a16f8","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn69@2020_3/2020/09/05/09-01-12-675_bc1db14463de898f.webp","destWidth":2639,"destHeight":1979,"sourceBytes":38294,"destBytes":38294,"author":"insider@insider.com (Melanie Weir)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f52aa85e6ff30001d4e740f?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn7@2020_2/2020/09/05/09-01-14-049_467c29b286f6f38d.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f52ab24e6ff30001d4e741f?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn97@2020_1/2020/09/05/09-01-16-153_4808f02c78616c94.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f52ab43e6ff30001d4e7420?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn47@2020_2/2020/09/05/09-01-15-069_0b92f433031cdffc.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f52ab65e6ff30001d4e7421?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn42@2020_6/2020/09/05/09-01-17-329_53f6b2d2c6eb2e15.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn60@2020_3/2020/09/05/09-01-18-751_00f09200df8426be.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?i=KWxZi5rVRSY:SySyqq8GMng:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn54@2020_1/2020/09/05/09-01-13-963_bb42ba12fc740183.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?i=KWxZi5rVRSY:SySyqq8GMng:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn93@2020_5/2020/09/05/09-01-18-971_7cd489da5ad904e3.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?i=KWxZi5rVRSY:SySyqq8GMng:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn49@2020_5/2020/09/05/09-01-13-954_d840e169391ebe6e.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?d=cGdyc7Q-1BI":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn54@2020_1/2020/09/05/09-01-18-350_767e235117808cfa.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/clusterstock?d=QXVau8BzmBE":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn12@2020_4/2020/09/05/09-01-17-769_edf0fa9b5dde1c97.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/clusterstock/~4/KWxZi5rVRSY":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn42@2020_5/2020/09/05/09-01-20-163_e2f6045b19c06d85.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1599296467310},{"createdTime":"2020-09-05 17:01:07","updatedTime":"2020-09-05 17:01:07","title":"How to add alt text to images in Squarespace to make your website more accessible","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-add-alt-text-to-images-in-squarespace","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f43d75089aff80028ab7776?format=jpeg\" alt=\"woman working from home using laptop computer garden\" height=\"1399\" width=\"2800\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Adding alt text to images on your Squarespace site makes it more accessible.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Gary Yeowell/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>You can add alt text to images in Squarespace to boost your website's SEO and make it more accessible.</li><li>An image's file name acts as the alt text by default if no other alt text is provided.</li><li>Changing or adding an image's alt text can be accomplished with just a few clicks.</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\">Visit Business Insider's Tech Reference library for more stories</a>.</strong></li></ul><p><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/alt-text\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Alt text</a>, the text associated with an image that is sometimes displayed in place of an image, can help boost your site's <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/seo\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">SEO</a> (as search engines use alt text to identify the content of a webpage) and make it more accessible for people using assistive screen readers or browsers with images disabled.</p><p>When adding alt text to images, it's best to use \"short, readable terms that describe the image and relate to your site content,\" according to <a href=\"https://support.squarespace.com/hc/en-us/articles/206542357-Adding-alt-text-to-images\">Squarespace</a>. They recommend keeping the text to 12 words or fewer, being descriptive and helpful (think about how you'd describe the image to someone who couldn't see it), and incorporating keywords without going overboard.&#160;</p><p>In <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/squarespace\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Squarespace</a>, an image's file name will usually serve as the alt text by default, but rather than renaming and reuploading your site's images with more descriptive file names you can manually add alt text with just a few simple clicks.&#160;</p><p>For more information on adding alt text to different kinds of images on your Squarespace site than those detailed below, <a href=\"https://support.squarespace.com/hc/en-us/articles/206542357-Adding-alt-text-to-images\">visit Squarespace's website</a>.</p><h2><strong>How to add alt text to an inline image in Squarespace</strong></h2><p>Captions added to inline photos automatically become the alt text for the image.</p><p><strong>1.</strong> Add or edit the caption text.</p><p><strong>2.</strong> Hover over the image, then click \"Edit.\"</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f43d16989aff80028ab7754?format=jpeg\" alt=\"squarespace 4\" height=\"1800\" width=\"2880\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Click &#34;Edit.&#34;\n<p class=\"copyright\">Abigail Abesamis/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>3.</strong> If you do not want the alt text/caption to be visible, navigate to the \"Design\" tab, then select \"Do Not Display Caption\" from the dropdown menu.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f43d22542f43f001ddfe984?format=jpeg\" alt=\"squarespace 5\" height=\"1800\" width=\"2880\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>In the &#34;Design&#34; tab, click &#34;Do Not Display Caption,&#34; if you want.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Abigail Abesamis/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>4.</strong> Click \"Apply.\" When you're finished editing the page, click \"Save.\"</p><h2><strong>How to add alt text to all other types of image blocks in Squarespace</strong></h2><p>For Poster, Card, Overlap, Collage, and Stack images, simply add alt text by editing the Filename.</p><p><strong>1.</strong> Hover over the image, then click \"Edit.\"</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f43ce3789aff80028ab7741?format=jpeg\" alt=\"squarespace 1\" height=\"1800\" width=\"2880\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Click &#34;Edit&#34; over the image.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Abigail Abesamis/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>2.</strong> In the \"Content\" tab, edit the Filename.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f43d07d89aff80028ab774f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"squarespace 3\" height=\"1800\" width=\"2880\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Changing the filename will change the alt text.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Abigail Abesamis/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>3.</strong> Click \"Apply.\" When you're finished editing the page, click \"Save.\"</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f43cf2e89aff80028ab774a?format=jpeg\" alt=\"squarespace 2\" height=\"1800\" width=\"2880\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Click &#34;Apply,&#34; then &#34;Save.&#34;\n<p class=\"copyright\">Abigail Abesamis/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><h2><strong>How to add alt text to a gallery page image in Squarespace</strong></h2><p><strong>1.</strong> Navigate to the gallery page from the \"Pages\" panel.</p><p><strong>2.</strong> Hover over the image, then click the gear icon.</p><p><strong>3.</strong> Add alt text by editing the image title in the \"Content\" tab.</p><p><strong>4.</strong> Click \"Save.\"</p><h2><strong>How to add alt text to a gallery block image in Squarespace</strong></h2><p>Gallery blocks can be added to blog posts, product items, and individual events.</p><p><strong>1.</strong> Hover over the gallery block, then click \"Edit.\"</p><p><strong>2.</strong> Hover over the image, then click the gear icon.</p><p><strong>3.</strong> Enter an image title, then click \"Save.\"</p><h2><strong>Related coverage from&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">Tech Reference</a>:</strong></h2><ul><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-is-alt-text\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">What is alt text? How to use the page element for images to improve your website's accessibility and search ranking<br></a></h3></li><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-add-alt-text-to-images-on-twitter\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">How to add alt text to images on Twitter so they can be read with screen readers</a></h3></li><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-view-alt-text-in-word\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">How to view, add, or edit alt text on an image in Microsoft Word to help users with screen readers</a></h3></li><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-see-alt-text-in-pdf\" Wix, to help users and boost your Google rankings</a></h3></li></ul><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a
